title: Radiant Ruby & Diamond Pendant Necklace - A Contemporary Haaram
materials: 18K Yellow Gold (సువర్ణము) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features a central Cushion Cut Ruby with excellent clarity
surrounded by brilliant cut Diamonds (వజ్రాలు) with VS clarity. Accented with drop-shaped rubies.
features: A modern take on the traditional Haaram. The necklace features a delicate chain with repeating openwork motifs set with diamonds. The pendant showcases a geometric design with a large central ruby, surrounded by a halo of diamonds. Dropping rubies add a touch of classic charm to this contemporary piece.
colors: with the sparkling brilliance of white diamonds. This combination is both classic and modern.
occasions: Perfect for modern celebrations and special occasions. Can be worn for cocktail parties
or even paired with traditional attire for a Sangeet or pre-wedding functions.
description: This striking necklace combines the richness of traditional South Indian jewelry with a modern aesthetic. The use of high-quality rubies and diamonds, along with the exceptional craftsmanship of our artisans, makes this a truly unique and valuable piece. The Hyderabadi Polish adds a touch of heritage and ensures lasting shine.
